articles.title: Diablo Immortal gets new alpha test with endgame content, Crusader class - Polygon
articles.description: A new Diablo Immortal alpha test is opening up, which offers a host of endgame content and a new class for testers to sample. The first test begins in Australia for Android users, but will open up over time to include more regions and platforms.

articles.title: Samurai Gunn 2 coming to Steam Early Access summer 2021, Switch later - Polygon
articles.description: Developer Beau Blyth’s long-awaited platform fighter Samurai Gunn 2 will hit Steam Early Access this summer, coming to Nintendo Switch later. It will include new buddies from games like Minit and Spelunky 2.
articles.content: Long-awaited platform fighter will hit Steam Early Access first, Switch later
